sense.def:
Kdor je
idle
, ne dela ničesar, zlasti takrat, ko bi moral.

seg.quote: ...those who sit idly by while you slave over a hot stove.
No one can afford to pay troops to sit about in idleness.

sense.def:
Stroji ali tovarne, ki so
idle
, niso v rabi.

seg.quote: The machinery could not be converted, and so stood idle.

sense.def:
It would be idle to do something
rečemo, kadar mislimo, da z nečim ne bi dosegli nič koristnega;

seg.quote: It would be idle to look for a solution at this stage.

sense.def:
Z izrazom
idle
opišemo nekaj, kar storimo brez pravega razloga, pogosto zato, ker nimamo boljšega dela.

seg.quote: Sudhir and Judy carried on long, idle conversations.
She glanced idly down the list of contents.

sense.def:
To idle away a period of time
pomeni preživeti nekaj časa tako, da zelo malo delamo.
